body.name: Phomemo Label Maker - Label Maker Machine with Tape P12, Portable Bluetooth Label Printer Handheld Built-in Cutter Small Label Maker, Mini Thermal Transfer Printer with Template for Product Organizing
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 22 mins
features: 【Powerful Inkless Label Maker】The P12 mini label maker stands out from other label printers by supporting both thermal and thermal transfer labels. This addresses the limitations of thermal labels which are not resistant to high temperatures and tend to fade. Ideal for a range of applications, from outdoor potting to labeling dishwashers in the kitchen. Get it all done with P12 label maker machine with tape ! (Please note: Only Q5 thermal transfer labels are heat resistant.)

【Prints on P12 Label Maker Tape】This bluetooth label maker prints on the P12 label tape, which is available in a wide range of colours and materials. Not only are self-adhesive label paper and plastic labels in various colours, but also sation ribbons for decoration and fabric iron-on labels for clothing.

【Bluetooth Connectivity】Bluetooth connection via the Print Master app to start designing and printing labels anytime, anywhere. The app offers 12 fonts, 62 borders and 1096 symbol stickers, giving you a easy and efficient label printing experience. The portable bluetooth label printer supports 1-3 lines of text. Minimum 2mm white space of the label to reduce waste.

【Compact and Lightweight】Phomemo P12 label maker mini labeler measuring just 180g, is perfect for on-the-go use. Whether you're working from home, in the office, or traveling, you can always have your portable label maker at hand to keep your things organized and tidy.

【Automatic Power Off to Save Battery Power】The small label makers supports two power supply modes: 6 AAA alkaline batteries or remove the batteries and insert the Type-C cable and 5V-2A plug to print.It boasts an impressive print capability of up to 67 meters on a single set of batteries. The auto shut-off function saves power and enhances battery life when idle. (Please note that the six AAA alkaline batteries are not included.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Whether you're at home, in your home office, or in a student dorm room, the mini label printer is perfect for any occasion. With its portable design, you can fully customize your labels wherever you are.

This bluetooth label makers offers a wide range of customization options, including 154 font sizes, 70 box styles, and over 1000 icons. Additionally, you can underline text, create multiple lines of text, or insert a date to help with organization.

Please note that our Print Master App does not compromise customer privacy. In order to connect, the app requires Android users to grant the necessary permissions, including turning on the GPS positioning function.

Mini Bluetooth Label Maker - Phomemo P12 Mini but powerful label maker The P12 labler marker has a small window on its exterior, which allows us to check the usage of our labels. This feature helps to prevent printing interruptions and ensure complete prints. Saving labels bluetooth label maker machine Compared to other handheld label makers, the portable label maker produces labels with shorter left and right margins, resulting in less label waste.

The best tool for home office organization The labels printed by the P12 label makers are long-lasting and can safely be used for many years without the text fading or becoming illegible, even when exposed to high or low temperatures. Bigger and clearer fonts The Phomemo P12 mini label printer has a wider effective printing width of 9mm compared to the traditional 5mm of keyboard label makers. This larger and clearer font is more helpful for organization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT customer service! Great printer!
reviews.reviewText: Must read! I bought the P12 but it wouldn’t stay connected. Called customer service first time and that person was not informed and said it was defective. Amazon refunded everything. I ordered it again because I still had the extra tape and thought what are the chances, right? Well it did it again. This time I emailed the company as it was late. I am not kidding when I say I got the greatest customer service rep this time. It sounds crazy, but they were so helpful we have emailed back n forth 30xs! Only because I was so hesitant but they assured me it was the charging block! You MUST USE a 5v-2A charging plug or the stream of power will cause the unit to shut off! So they offered and sent a brand new, upgraded P12Pro which is rechargeable and does not need batteries which I wanted but didn’t know the original P12 was battery operated. I bought the correct charger from Amazon and it works beautifully!!!! And I ran it so long on one charge I used the whole roll of tape! It charges very quickly too! So I had mentioned I was looking at getting colored tape when I told the service agent how thrilled I was with the product and he is sending me free colored tape rolls!!! This customer service just can’t be beat and that’s what matters most when I buy anything! They have been very kind, replied immediately to every email, knew exactly what the problem was and replaced the second unit I was refunded for with an upgraded model at no cost or inconvenience to me! All the while replying instantly to emails with great kindness and patience! I HIGHLY recommend this P12Pro label printer! The app is so user friendly and installed in just a minute! You must connect the device thru the app not your phones Bluetooth or it won’t connect. I couldn’t believe how long one fast charge lasted and my main reason for this printer was having a continuous tape so I could make a label as long as I want! Not all, actually very few have that option! You can trust this company completely! And email them directly with any questions- you’ll be blown away by the knowledge and very kind customer service! I’d leave 100 🌟review if I could!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute stickers and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I love the ability to customize your own labels with text and images! Very cute and love that it comes in pink! It's light, portable, and very easy to use. I love that it's blue tooth and USB charging!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY setup and use. No invasive software.
reviews.reviewText: I haven't had a label maker in many years. This looked like a good way to get things organized. The labels go on easy and come off easy if you want to replace them. That always used to be the drawback with these sorts of things. The Bluetooth connects easily and doesn't ask a bunch of invasive information. You don't have to log in and join a crowd and do all sorts of other drama just to get your labels made. I had mine out of the box and making labels in less than 5 minutes. I also discovered many functions this little machine does that I didn't even need but I'm enjoying. I'm ordering more color labels and I'm going to use it for other things. Definitely worth the inexpensive price and it is surprisingly sturdy for its low cost. I think I will get a lot of use out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, small, works well
reviews.reviewText: I only got it in today but downloading and setting up the app is very easy and it prints clearly with only a little pixel being visible. There is a lot of options to choose from for font as well as pictures to add. The sticker paper also seems to hold well on my wooden cabinets but again I've only just put them on so that remains to be seen. Overall I'm happy with my purchase but I don't plan to use this for heavy duty labeling, just some things around the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very intuitive app, works quickly, and gives quality labels. The label tape it comes with can be a little hard to get the backing off of, but I consider that to be a good trait since it doesn't come undone in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little label printer
reviews.reviewText: I have OCD and it was creating a huge problem in my house. I need things to be put away in specific spots and certain ways.After looking at several labelers I went with this one. Glad I did. The price was good and the refill ribbon was cheaper than most. (Huge impact as to why I picked this one)I love that I can multiple lines at a time. I'm able to create labels with specific details needed. I have made several labels with no problems. The edge cut crisp, the spacing at the beginning and end are even. I love this feature!!! There's a lot of cute features that I can add to the labels. Different fonts, stickers etc.It's all done on my phone, which makes it super convenient.I definitely would recommend this label maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it's portable,that's good.still; can't remove tape cartridge.inst very poor.just says remove cartridge,not how..i assumed it just pulled up but something is holding it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and works well
reviews.reviewText: Was inexpensive and small, which I needed. It’s a thermal printer so I don’t know how long before the labels fade. But the app works well and I had no trouble printing labels. Not nearly the quality of my Brother P-Touch, but that was way more money and this serves its purpose well as a portable compact label maker.

Amazing mini label printer! I purchased them as im borrowing a space at a store to sell my items and they required a printed SKU with price. This was the best deal with great reviews so I purchased them. As soon as I had them in my hands I printed out label in 5 min. It is very easy to use and portable. Recommend to any beginners of small buisiness!

I got this printer to label some stuff around the house and also some school stuff for the kids. At first I was having an issue with the sample that came with the printer so I contacted the seller and they were amazing at replying and helping me out, I sent out a picture and video and they sent me an entire set of labels which was really great. The printer works perfectly and the app is very easy to use

Prints terrific labels!We use this product for labelling boxes in bins around the houseWhat we like about this product is the small form factor and how fast it printsDidn’t need to use the instructions to understand how to set upOverall quite pleased

This label maker is so bad, like really bad. Barely prints anything on the white tape and black film doesn't move which would technically just get imprinted on the white tape by thermal action. Pure garbage and defective piece, will be returniflng it.
